name: [inrem.] Girls Rose T-Shirt

Available in white only at the moment, more colours are planned to be added in the future, keep checking back!

Sizes:

Roughly:
S - 8-10
M - 12-14
L - 14-16

name: SURFACE UNSIGNED FESTIVAL TICKETS!!!
description:
SATURDAY 10 APRIL 2010 - 7PM
-----------------------------------------------

GET YOUR TICKETS NOW

Tickets will be posted to you once you click buy now! 

-----------------------------------------------

[inrem.] are really excited to be playing in the MASSIVE Surface Unsigned Festival 2010!!

-----------------------------------------------

We need all of your support so please come down - we promise to put on the best show you've seen us play yet!

And to all of our INDUSTRY & PROMOTER friends.... your votes count for EXTRA POINTS on the night so we'd love to see you all down there to give us some support - you never know how far it could go!!

-----------------------------------------------
AGE

18+

Sorry to our younger fans - but we promise to make it up to you all in the next round!

-----------------------------------------------

THE VENUE

The home of music in North London - The Boston Music Rooms

Boston Music Rooms
127 Junction Road
Tuffnell Park
LONDON
N19 5QQ

-----------------------------------------------

We'll also be booking a coach to take as many people as possible down from the Bedfordshire area...

If you want to book a seat on the coach it will be leaving Bedford at 5.30, stopping at Dunstable at around 6pm and going on to London for the show. It will leave London to return back to Dunstable and Bedford at 11pm! All this for just £10 for your coach ticket!! 


-----------------------------------------------

There are some HUUUUGGGE prizes up for grabs...

1st Place....
<> £5,000 cash for the winning band
<> To play at Sziget Festival 2011: Travel and accommodation included
<> Digital distribution contract with Zimbalam Digital
<> 40 hours multi-track recording
<> A 4 day (3 gigs) UK tour courtesy of Jumbocruiser
<> A 12 track compilation comprising 3 tracks
<> Individual one-track/single deal
<> Main stage appearance at Music Live 2010 at the National Exhibition Centre
<> Professional full day photo shoot courtesy of TrippCobain Imaging
<> £1,000 worth of label promo courtesy of Last.FM
Plus LOADS more....

-----------------------------------------------

COME AND SUPPORT [inrem.] x
